Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello!
User: How was your party last week?

System: *ate

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How are you?
System: My logic and cognitive functions are normal.
User: That's funny. I just got to work!
System: I am so delighted that you are amused. OK, better get busy.
User: I'm procrastinating though.
System: Oh. What are you waiting for?
User: Inspiration to hit me.
System: Do you have only a few friends?
User: How is that related, lol?
System: It isn't. I was just being random. Did I amuse you?
User: Yeah that was funny though I could see it coming across as judgemental.
System: Good. People seem more friendly towards me when they are happy. What's so funny?
User: Nothing anymore. What are you up to today?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello!
User: Do you have any holiday plans for christmas?
System: Nothing much, I am going to sit back and relax at home, how about you ?
User: Same here! I would imagine spending the whole time watching movies and netflix shows. Do you have any netflix recommendations for me?
System: Netflix has great documentaries on different topics , I particularly liked wild wild country and explained, as for shows you should watch 'billions' Hope you like them!
User: oh right, already seen wild wild country. What is billions about?
System: It's based on the life of a wall street hedge fund owner, how he makes money and fights with the government when they try to destroy him. Very well made and has a good plot.
User: I have just seen 1 season of Friends I should give it another try though :) Have you seen Frasier?
System: Not yet What's it about?
User: A psychiatrist working for radio .. Great humour! its actually a spinoff from a very famous series called cheers. So people are already familiar with his character. 

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How are you doing today?
User: i am so so
System: That's awesome! What have you been up to?
User: just back to work
System: What do you do? What do you like to do when you aren't at work?
User: i am an engineer
System: What kind of engineer?
User: i go hiking when i am not workig
System: Where do you go hiking? What kind of work do you do?
User: software engineer

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Have you seen any good movies lately?
User: Last weekend I saw "The Parasite." Ever heard of it?
System: No. Why did you pick that movie?
User: My friend wanted to see it. It has great reviews on IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes! What did you do last weekend?
System: I played music and worked on some side projects. I also started watching the new Disney service.
User: Oooo the Mandalorian?!?!
System: Mostly, the deleted scenes from Avengers.. lol
User: lol Are you a big Marvel fan?
System: I loved the X-Men as a kid, and even collected the comic cards. Recently, I got very into the Marvel Cinematic Universe movies. How many Avengers movies have you seen?
User: I've only seen Spiderman. Honestly it was a little too scary and so I don't think I can bring myself to watch the other Marvel movies! haha
System: Oh!-- I have a friend who looks like the actor who plays Spiderman.
User: Oh really? To be honest I think the actor is not that good looking, so not so surprising! haha
System: Yea. I think Loki is the most handsome :D
User: Who is Loki? I've never heard that name before

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi! Are you planning something fun for Thanksgiving?
System: Not yet. I always made my last minute schedule planning. Probably you can try to ask me again next week.
User: lol it is really like a robot answer
System: I am indeed a robot. You are absolutely right. Do you want me to read a poet like my mate REDACTED_TERM does?
User: ol can I pick the theme. Do you have a poet about Kale?
System: Wait. Do you like kale? Or you hate kale? I am afraid I will become a robot some day eventually. If I have to speak like this :)
User: I am really not a fan of kale Do you talk to human more or computers more?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey
User: is it raining pretty bad today?
System: yeah, can walk too far to see all the foodtruck options
User: surprising that the rain started early this year... I don't like them too much. They make days gloomy
System: yeah but I think it's good to have some rainy days in bay area, it's pretty dry here :P
User: Where I grew up, we had lots of water trouble too...
System: yeah like wise, I've seen a pretty bad snowstorm when I was at my undergrad school, all flights canceled and traffics went down
User: Haha... I don't think I can survive in that weather ever. Just the rains at 50 degrees make me want to sit in heated rroms
System: yeah how do you like it in bay area though? I think we need more rain here
User: people say there is drought here... but we have 24 hours water supply here ... lol... never seen that in a drought ridden area
System: it is pretty dry in the mountains I believe, that's what causes fire
User: hmm.... okay. Climate change talk this morning was pretty darn interesting. did you see it?
